list-item.p: Periodic vital signs recording (blood pressure, heart rate, respiratory rate, SpO 2, GCS, body temperature) (once/work shift, thrice/day), in order to early identify a possible rapid worsening of respiratory functions requiring an increase of the level of care
Arterial blood gas analysis monitoring (mainly between 5 th and 7 th day or if clinical worsening), to be evaluated together with the intensive care specialist in charge
